reviewText: This anime is, in a few words; awe inspiring, beautiful, suspenseful, and shows the true value of love, friendship, and family. It's a wonderful which I have enjoyed emmensely. It's the time of anime that keeps you on the edge of your seat until the very end. The kind that you realize new things about everytime you watch it. I have watched it from start to finish at least 5 to 6 times. Now, this is a longer anime, keep that in mind. But, I give 5 stars. If you love romance, suspence, reverse harems, love trianges, and good fighting scenes. This may be a very good anime for you to check out. I highly recommend it!
weird name but excellent series and very exciting series. please everyone check it out you will not be disappointed.the movie never slows down and keeps you guessing.

This actually is my favorite anime. I think the charecters were well developed there was little to no filler, and anything that was filler was done properly. I will admit that the story overall is not very believable, but none the less is well done and very aluring. I still remember crying the first time I watched it when they first released the show on Tokyo TV.
